title: muTTa bEDavo
sahitya:
muTTa bEDavO ennanu krSNayya nI


anupallavi

  duDuku mADalu bEDavO dUra nillO


caraNam 1    toretanada bALu mattu kELayya krSNa hiritanada permeyuLLa 
dore maganAdarEnu sallado I kArya seraga biDalo ranga caraNakke eraguve
    caraNam 2    mosaru hEDige shiradali dEvakArya mIsalu pAl beNNeyo
kusuma nAbhane ninna manetanake Agado vasudheyoLu ninna daNDiparillave
    caraNam 3    pettavarillavEno ninage mattu hitavanorevavarillave 
muttina giDa tOrda enna muddu krSNayya hottAyito biDo tande purandara viTTala
